exceptions.tactic: apply is_derive_n_PSeries with (n := n) (a := a) (x := x).
exceptions.exn: The reference n was not found in the current environment.

In environment a : nat -> R x, r : R Heqr : CV_radius a = r H : Rabs x < r X : (?K@{n:=0%nat} -> ?V@{n:=0%nat}) -> ?K@{n:=0%nat} -> Prop Unable to unify "Rabs x < r" with "ex_derive (fun x : R => PSeries a x) x".

original: intros. unfold ex_derive_n. induction n. - intros. apply I. - intros. apply ex_derive. apply is_derive_n_PSeries with (n := n) (a := a) (x := x). apply H.
